entity.name: audits
entity.audit_errors_wsnotexist_text: The webservice '$1' doesn't exist. Please contact your administrator.
entity.audit_errors_raci_text: The current RACI matrix of the item $1 doesn't allow you to perform this action.
entity.audit_errors_raci_persons: Please contact the Responsible or Accountable person(s) of the item $1.
entity.audit_errors_authorization_text: Authorization refused: you're not allowed to execute this operation.
entity.audit_errors_argumentexception_text: Action refused: you're not allowed to execute this action.
entity.audit_errors_interviewdelete_text: Action refused: you're not allowed to delete a 'completed' interview.
entity.audit_errors_concurrency_text:
Operation refused: you're not allowed to finalize this operation because the selected object has been updated by another user.
Refresh the principal screen to update the selected object before start again the operation.
entity.audit_errors_searchdate_text: Date format error: change the date format to any other format for example 2007, 2007-01 or 2007-01-01.
entity.audit_raci_update_error_add: At least one RACI right must be selected.
entity.audit_auditadd_error_dates: 'End date' must be higher than 'Start date'.
entity.audit_auditupdate_error_date: 'End Date' must be higher than 'Start Date'.
entity.audit_auditupdate_error_closed: Only RACI A stakeholder can close the audit.
entity.audit_auditdocument_upload: Select the document file to upload
entity.audit_auditdocument_upload_maxsize: The file $1 has exceeded the authorized maximum size of $2 octets.
entity.audit_auditdocument_upload_httperror: HTTP error $1 reached when uploading file $2.
entity.audit_auditdocument_upload_securityerror: Security error ($1) reached when uploading file $2.
entity.audit_recommendation_auditor_nocomplianc: No compliance topics available for this recommendation
entity.audit_recommendation_auditor_error_recom: 'Title' of the recommendation must be filled.
entity.audit_recommendation_auditor_error_refer: 'Reference' of the recommendation must be filled.
entity.audit_recommendation_auditee_targetdate_: Reset the pushed back target date marker
entity.audit_recommendation_auditee_error_targe: The target date must be filled.
entity.audit_recommendation_dependency_change: Do you want to visualize the recommendation '$1' ?
entity.audit_recommendation_compliance_nocompli: No compliance (audit linked isn't associated with a standard)
entity.audit_action_duedate_resetescalade: Reset the pushed back target date marker
entity.audit_racichangerequest_title: List of RACI change requests for module
entity.audit_racichangerequest_text: At least a RACI change for the module request your validation. Select a change in the list and apply your modification.
entity.audit_racichangerequest_warning: Warning: validating the changes on your own informations in the RACI of the module will cause your disconnection from module.
entity.audit_validation_text: Do you want to save the changes you made ?
entity.audit_error_concurrency_text:
The item '$1' has been already updated by an other user.
Click on the Refresh button to update it.
You'll have to relaunch your operation after that.
